item.title: Zuozhi Wang
item.description: About Me I am a sixth year Computer Science PhD student at UC Irvine, under the supervision of Professor Chen Li. My research focuses are on the areas of distributed big data processing and query optimization. I am on the job market this year :) Education 2017-2023 (expected) PhD, Computer Science; UC Irvine 2013-2017 BS, Computer Science; UC Irvine Project Highlights Texera, a system for scalable and collaborative data analytics using workflows.
